Translations.Text: wakam min malakin fi l-samawati la tugh'ni shafaʿatuhum shayan illa min baʿdi an yadhana l-lahu liman yashau wayarda
inna alladhina la yu'minuna bil-akhirati layusammuna l-malaikata tasmiyata l-untha
wama lahum bihi min ʿil'min in yattabiʿuna illa l-zana wa-inna l-zana la yugh'ni mina l-haqi shayan
fa-aʿrid ʿan man tawalla ʿan dhik'rina walam yurid illa l-hayata l-dun'ya
dhalika mablaghuhum mina l-ʿil'mi inna rabbaka huwa aʿlamu biman dalla ʿan sabilihi wahuwa aʿlamu bimani ih'tada
walillahi ma fi l-samawati wama fi l-ardi liyajziya alladhina asau bima ʿamilu wayajziya alladhina ahsanu bil-hus'na

alladhina yajtanibuna kabaira l-ith'mi wal-fawahisha illa l-lamama inna rabbaka wasiʿu l-maghfirati huwa aʿlamu bikum idh ansha-akum mina l-ardi wa-idh antum ajinnatun fi butuni ummahatikum fala tuzakku anfusakum huwa aʿlamu bimani ittaqa
am lam yunabba bima fi suhufi musa
wa-an laysa lil'insani illa ma saʿa
waqawma nuhin min qablu innahum kanu hum azlama wa-atgha
laysa laha min duni l-lahi kashifatun
wa-in yaraw ayatan yuʿ'ridu wayaqulu sih'run mus'tamirrun
wakadhabu wa-ittabaʿu ahwaahum wakullu amrin mus'taqirrun
walaqad jaahum mina l-anbai ma fihi muz'dajarun
fatawalla ʿanhum yawma yadʿu l-daʿi ila shayin nukurin
khushaʿan absaruhum yakhrujuna mina l-ajdathi ka-annahum jaradun muntashirun
muh'tiʿina ila l-daʿi yaqulu l-kafiruna hadha yawmun ʿasirun
